summary: Diff adds per-post likedBy tracking types and a migration module, and updates the PostCard UI to toast on duplicate-like errors. However, the backend likePost enforcement and deterministic duplicate-like error message are not evidenced in the provided diff summary (backend/main.mo is truncated before likePost). The diff also appears to introduce several unrelated backend/frontend features (profiles, moderation, notifications, polls, suspension) that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Enforce a one-like-per-student-per-post rule in the backend so the same authenticated caller cannot successfully like the same post more than once, and return a deterministic error message containing the phrase "already liked" on duplicate like attempts.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the new `likedBy` field added to `Post` and a migration module, but the likePost implementation and its duplicate-like rejection/error message are not present in the visible (truncated) backend/main.mo excerpt, so enforcement and the deterministic error text cannot be verified from this summary.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated; shows Post has likedBy but no likePost implementation visible)
backend/migration.mo (adds likedBy initialization but does not enforce like rules)
